Description: The primary purpose of a Forklift Mechanic is to maintain, diagnose and repair a variety of forklifts and other materials handling equipment. They must ensure that all components and systems are in good working order and that the machines are kept in a safe condition. They must also be able to provide technical advice and guidance, as well as ensure that the necessary safety procedures are followed.Skills
Skills:
Ability to service and repair forklift trucks
Knowledge of different makes and models
Good problem solving skills
Ability to work with minimal supervision

Knowledge of Health & Safety regulations
Ability to diagnose and repair mechanical issues
Ability to perform preventative maintenance
Ability to troubleshoot electrical problems
Excellent mechanical aptitude
Good communication skills
Ability to read and interpret technical manuals
